name: SetVersion
description: Replaces the `__version__` value in a set of files.
helpMarkDown: The *Update version variables* task will search Python files for a `__version__` variable and replace its value with the version of your build. By running this before publishing, you can automatically update the version number and ensure your upload succeeds.
author: Steve Dower

inputs.name: root
inputs.label: Base directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Base directory to search for files matching the below patterns.

inputs.name: patterns
inputs.label: File patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files to update the `__version__` variable in. Multiple patterns may be specified

inputs.name: encoding
inputs.label: Output encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown: Encoding to use when writing files
